title: gpt-4相关
author: 王宇
article:
_The current model behind the GPT-4 API is named_ **_gpt-4–0314_**_._

To access this model through the GPT-4 API, it will cost:

*   $0.03 per 1k prompt request tokens\*
*   $0.06 per 1k completion response tokens\*
